name: Semantic Search using Sparse Encoders
description: Build a flow that allows you to search by text and rank results by semantic similarity, to improve search quality. This template uses [Neural Sparse](https://huggingface.co/opensearch-project/opensearch-neural-sparse-encoding-v2-distill), a sparse encoder, to convert text into sparse vectors. This implementation is potentially more cost efficient than the dense (k-NN) vectors for smaller indexes (< 10M documents).
